content: elanide is a simple top-down raglan worked in fingering weight it can be knitted in a highly customizable stripe pattern with slipped stitches transitions with its mock turtle neck hem and cuffs in twisted ribbing it s a basic staple garment it can be adjusted to any desired body and sleeve length as well as made with a freeing range of ease use it as a canvas to play with colours or
